abstract: NBC’s ratings are the lowest of any broadcast network; brands are perturbed by Twitter hackings; and who won at the Oscars, and what they wore.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: NBC Ratings Tumble and Twitter Hacking Can Undermine Brands
